channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2714] Greatest School Answering Machine Message Ever
item.description: For a great laugh, press 1. Even if it's fake, it's right on.

item.title: [+2351] BREAKING: Texas Judge: Ban On Gay Marriage Unconstitutional
item.description: Dallas state District Judge Tena Callahan ruled Thursday that the state bans on same-sex marriage violates the constitutional guarantee to equal protection under the law

item.title: [+1897] Unusual Marriage Proposal Doesn’t End Well (Pics)
item.description: A public marriage proposal can be a nice gesture. It shows the other person that you are vulnerable, confident, and extremely happy to be with them. The use of signs in your proposal can be an interesting way to pop the question. Unfortunately for Jennifer, things didn’t go so well.

item.title: [+1850] Cops shoot homeowner who called 911 in the back six times
item.description: "That's all right. Don't worry about it. I got your back. ... We clear?" The family says the officers were not aware that the 911 call was still recording as they spoke about covering up the shooting.

item.title: [+1822] Sexual Favor Fail
item.description: I have a younger friend who dates a Psychology TA at her school, and she sent me this amazing exchange he had with a student last semester.  !split

item.title: [+1704] DIGG DUGG
[+1406] The Office E-mail Translator
item.description: Because sometimes you just can't sift through all the passive-aggressiveness.

item.title: [+1121] Millionaire Michael Moore, Capitalism Did Nothing for me.
item.description: Millionaire documentary film director Michael Moore told CNSNews.com at the D.C. premiere of his new film that capitalism did nothing for him. What a jackass.

item.title: [+1006] Sen. Graham Calls Beck 'A Cynic' And Birthers "CRAZY"
item.description: Sen. Lindsey Graham, (R-S.C.) offered unusually blunt assessments of the fringe elements of his party and conservative media on Thursday, calling the popular and bombastic Fox News host Glenn Beck a "cynic" whose show was antithetical to American values. "Only in America can you make that much money crying," Graham said of Beck.

item.title: [+973] Judge rules FBI can't keep Cheney interview buried
item.description: A federal judge has ruled that the FBI must release its interview with then-Vice President Dick Cheney concerning the outing of CIA operative Valerie Plame. The Bush and Obama administrations have both sought to keep the Cheney interview secret, but Judge Emmet Sullivan has determined that there is no reason since the investigation has concluded.

item.title: [+902] Dear Jeff: I Can't Invest $100,000..Would Zero Work? [EMAIL]
item.description: Crazy email exchange between two guys stemming from some happening or meeting at a bar the night before. Bizarre, funny.

item.title: [+889] We Need More Lemons so less people die!!!!
[+880] Google Strips Pirate Bay Homepage from Search Results
item.description: The Pirate Bay’s homepage and seven other pages relating to the BitTorrent tracker website have been removed from Google’s search engine, following a DMCA complaint.

item.title: [+856] 2016 Olympic Announcement: Rio de Janeiro Hosts Summer Games
item.description: Rio de Janeiro has been chosen as the host city of the 2016 Summer Olympics, beating Madrid in the final round of voting.

item.title: [+756] If You Can Read This... [PIC]
[+749] 15 Essential Differences Between Men and Women
item.description: There are exceptions to every rule, but for the most part, these 15 points of contention provide for easy ways to perpetuate the rift been the two disparate halves of humanity.

item.title: [+709] Google Will... (PIC)
item.description: Some WTF search results by Google about... Google.

item.title: [+705] Fox News Reports Unemployment at a Staggering 149 Million
item.description: I had no idea things were this bad! I mean, our labor force is only 154 million, so that would put our unemployment rate at a whopping 97%. It would... if it were accurate.

item.title: [+683] 25 Hilarious Roller Coaster Photos [Photos]
item.description: The cameras placed on roller coasters capture some of the most perfect and precious moments in life, these are just a few hilarious ones.

item.title: [+666] Digg Would You Dump Your Boyfriend/Girlfriend This Way?
